ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: A Voigt model of an absorption feature.

DESC.PARA: A Voigt model of an absorption feature; using the absorbed Gaussian to model the core, and the absorbed Lorentzian to model the wings of an absorption feature.

The approximation presented in Astrophysical Formulae (K. R. Lang, 1980, 2nd ed., p. 220) is used. This approximation works best when the ratio between the FWHM of the Gaussian and Lorentzian sub-components is near unity.

ROW.DATA: Center of the feature, in Angstroms
